verbs.description: After a [V: bruising] [ARG0: confirmation battle] where every Democrat voted against him , new NASA Administrator James Bridenstine is reaching out to former opponents hoping to mend fences . It 's a different approach than other controversial Trump appointees

After [ARGM-LOC: a bruising confirmation battle] [R-ARGM-LOC: where] [ARG0: every Democrat] [V: voted] [ARG1: against him] , new NASA Administrator James Bridenstine is reaching out to former opponents hoping to mend fences . It 's a different approach than other controversial Trump appointees

It 's a different approach than other controversial Trump appointees
